Text: NDNs Upcoming EventsNDN Events TONIGHT Fundraising Reception with Senator Lieberman Monday October nd Join NDN and Senator Joe Lieberman on Monday October nd rescheduled from September th pm for an NDN fundraising reception at the home of Rob Hall and Bobby Thigpen E Capitol St SE This is an intimate fundraiser for individual donors in the metro area and PACs who have not been able to attend some of our larger events in the past Admission PAC or federal individual A big thanks to our Host Committee give or raise federal HonVic Fazio Claude Fontheim Rob Hall Tim Jenkins Chris Long Morris Reid Deane Shatz Dale Snape and Laurie Sullivan RSVP or s Megan Hess at x or mailto Update on NDNs Fall Conference Thanks to everyone who helped make NDNs Fall Conference Meeting the Challenges of a New Century such a success The conference held on October th featured a keynote address by Senator Joe Lieberman about the role of American leadership in the modern world remarks by Senator Mary Landrieu a session focusing on the new global security challenges featuring former National Security Advisor Samuel R Berger and Congresswoman Jane Harman as well as former Defense Department Undersecretary Walter B Slocombe and journalist and bin Laden expert Peter Bergen a session moderated by Rep Jim Davis featuring political analyst Charlie Cook and some of the best candidates running for the Senate and House Tom Strickland of Colorado Mark Pryor of Arkansas Dario Herrera of Nevada and Jack Conway of Kentucky an excellent discussion about how to promote economic growth in the US and around the world featuring Goldman Sachs Vice Chairman Robert Hormats former National Economic Advisor Gene Sperling and Representative Cal Dooley followed by a reception and dinner with numerous members of Congress and NDN friends To read Liebermans speech visit pressnewsreleasesadminphtml To read the USA Today article visit wwwusatodaycomnewswashdcoctliebermanhtm To read the Business Week article visit printpremiumcontentchtmmainwi ndow Regional NDN Events NDN in NoVA with Rep Jim Moran Thursday November th NDN will be hosting a breakfast fundraiser with Representative Jim Moran in Northern Virginia Thursday November th More information to follow RSVP or s Megan Hess at x or mailto NDN in Hartford CT with Rep John Larson Thursday December th NDN will be hosting a fundraiser with Representative John Larson in Hartford CT Thursday December th More information to follow RSVP or s Kim Kauffman at x or mailto NDN is also planning events in Seattle Southern and Northern CA in the upcoming months Look for information on these events in future emails If you would like to be involved with events in these cities contact Kim Kauffman at x or mailto New Dem Candidate Events Representative Brad Carson OK Thursday October th Join NDN Thursday October th am at Fontheim International th Street NW Suite North for a fundraiser for Rep Brad Carson Carson is a member of the House Transportation Small Business and Resources Committees To read more about Rep Carson or to give online please visit wwwnewdemorgcandidatessupporthouseshtml Suggested contribution individual or PAC RSVP or s Shelby Silverman at x or mailto Representative Harold Ford Jr TN Wednesday November th Please join NDN and Citigroup for a fundraiser for Rep Harold Ford Jr on Wednesday November th rescheduled from September th pm at Citigroup Pennsylvania Avenue NW Suite A rising star in the Democratic Party Rep Ford was the keynote speaker at the Democratic convention last year Rep Ford is a leader in the House New Democrat Coalition and represents the new generation of centrist leaders that NDN is trying to elect To learn more about Representative Ford or to contribute to his campaign online please visit wwwnewdemorgleadersfordshtml Suggested contribution CoHost PAC Individual RSVP or s Shelby Silverman x or mailto Watch for invitations to these candidate events SAVE THE DATE Dario
